title: Lemon and blueberry loaf cake
ingredients: ['75g butter, melted', '200g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 eggs', '190g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '125ml milk', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '60g walnuts', '145g blueberries, defrosted if frozen', 'For the lemon drizzle', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '50g caster sugar']
